headline: 8 Americans Were Hurt by Iran’s Strike on Base in Iraq
abstract: The service members showed symptoms of concussions after Iranian missiles hit air bases in Iraq last week. President Trump had said that “no Americans were harmed.”
lead_paragraph: Eight American troops were flown from their Iraqi bases after showing signs of concussions from Iranian missile strikes, the military said on Thursday,  despite earlier statements by President Trump that no Americans had been injured.
keywords: United States Defense and Military Forces
